taxon_name.authority: de Candolle in J. Lamarck and A. P. de Candolle

bio:treatment.description: Flowers: petals with no or only moderately developed crest. Capsules usually abruptly acute at apex, mostly 25-35 mm. Seeds appearing distinctly reticulate under magnification.
Sandy bottoms, abandoned fields, open woods, hillsides, and valleys, in disturbed soils

verbatim.text: Flowering early-late spring. Sandy bottoms, abandoned fields, open woods, hillsides, and valleys, in disturbed soils; 0-1500 m; Tex.

parsed.habitat: Sandy bottoms, abandoned fields, open woods, hillsides, and valleys, in disturbed soils;
